mapper.insert: INSERT INTO suggest (user_id, title, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO suggest_reply (suggest_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{suggestId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE suggest_reply SET suggest_reply.content = #{content} WHERE suggest_reply.reply_id = #{replyId};
mapper.select: SELECT s.reply_id , s.suggest_id , s.user_id , s.content , DATE_FORMAT(s.created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") AS created_at , u.nickname FROM suggest_reply s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE suggest_id=#{suggestId} ORDER BY s.created_at DESC LIMIT #{criteria.offset}, #{criteria.countPerPage}
SELECT count(suggest_id) FROM suggest_reply WHERE suggest_id = #{suggestId}

SELECT count(suggest_id) FROM suggest
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT s.suggest_id , s.user_id , s.title , s.content , DATE_FORMAT(s.created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") AS created_at , u.nickname FROM suggest s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY s.created_at desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{countPerPage}
